text: Futhi amenze isithunywa kubantwana bakwa-Israyeli (ethi), “ngizoza kunina nophawu oluvela eNkosini yenu ukuthi nginibumbele ngodaka lokho isimo sako esinjengesenyoni bese ngiphefumulela kuyona bese iphenduka inyoni (ephilayo) ngentando kaMvelinqangi futhi ngiphilisa abayizimpumputhe nabanesifo sochoko ngivuse abafileyo ngemvume kaMvelinqangi futhi ngiyanitshela ngalokho ekufanele ukuba nikudle nenifanele ukuba nikugcine ezindlini zenu, ngempela kunophawu kunina kulokho uma ningabakholwayo”
